Comment.text: -- Enforce naming conventions for index variables.
-- Why is an `erw` needed here? This should be by simp!
-- Arguments are explicit for parity with `zipIdx_map_fst`.
-- Arguments are explicit so we can rewrite from right to left.
Replace `zipIdx` with a starting index `i+1` with `zipIdx` starting from `i`, followed by a `map` increasing the indices by one. -/
Replace `zipIdx` with a starting index with `zipIdx` starting from 0, followed by a `map` increasing the indices. -/
